blocks.content: They say deserts are harsh. Not this one.

photos.caption: Ferrari lifts his head to great us.

blocks.content: The dark desert is gentle and soft. Sand is forgiving on the feat; dunes gently sweep the landscape; everyone nestles against the warm air.

photos.caption: Al-Wathba: an oasis of light nestled in the night.

blocks.content: Out here, luxury isn’t marble; it’s silence you can hear, footprints gone with each step.
